mapper.select: select BOOK_ID as bookId,bl.booklist_name as booklistName,ba.bath_name as batch_name,ca.two_name as twoname, CP_ID as cpId,TAROT_ID as tarotId,BOOKNAME as bookname,AUTHOR as author,SERIALIZATION as serialization,WORD_NUMBER as wordNumber, STATE as state,IF_CHARGE as ifCharge,PRICE as price,IF_ORIGINAL as ifOriginal,PRESS as press,PUBLISHING_TIME as publishingTime, RIGHT_START_TIME as rightStartTime,ERROR_END_TIME as errorEndTime,AUTHOR_ERROR_END_TIME as authorErrorEndTime, b.AUTHORIZATION_STATUS as authorizationStatus,AUTHOR_RIGHT_START_TIME as authorRightStartTime from book b left join COPYRIGHT c on b.COPYRIGHTID = c.COPYRIGHTID left join BOOKLIST bl on b.booklist_id = bl.booklist_id left join "BATCH" ba on bl.batch_id = ba.batch_id left join "CATEGORY" ca on ca.category_id = b.category_id where 1=1
